runner

Class ScreenCreator<ModelClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends Model>,ViewClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends View>,ControllerClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends Controller>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • runner.ScreenCreator<ModelClass,ViewClass,ControllerClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    ModelClass - the class of the model, eg core.Model.class
    ViewClass - the class of the view, eg core.View.class
    ControllerClass - the class of the core.Controller, eg core.Controller.class

    public class ScreenCreator<ModelClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends Model>,ViewClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends View>,ControllerClass extends java.lang.Class<? extends Controller>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates a model, view, and controller class. This creates a Screen on demand with instances of the model, view and controller.
